item.title: Olsen banden 1
item.item:
# 2334082 type=video name=Olsenbanden 1 thumb=http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ikShuZp4zfhoKv7D3gYwNmG8GNJ.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/0793C52D96A5E179 player=default rating=-1.00 description=The first of 14 Olsen Gang films presents us with Egon Olsen, head of the gang, and his friends Benny and Kjeld, who want to become the best known gang in Denmark and eventually Europe by stealing a famous Bavarian work of art currently displayed in a Copenhagen museum. Although Egon's plan works out fine, there is only trouble ahead for the little gang./description
# 2334114 type=video name=Olsenbanden paa spanden thumb=http://1.ycloud.in/covers/284x408/olsen-banden-paa-spanden-2.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/3272B1611A4BD9D7 player=default rating=-1.00 description=Fengslene har alltid vÃ???Ã??Ã?Â¦rt utklekkingsanstalt for den perfekte forbrytelse. Fangene lÃ???Ã??Ã?Â¦rer av hverandre. Slik er det ogsÃ???Ã??Ã?Â¥ med Egon Olsen, leder for Olsenbanden. Mens han satt inne pÃ???Ã??Ã?Â¸nsket han ut hvordan han kunne stjele den fantastiske gullfiguren (verdt 12 millioner kroner) som tidligere hadde tilhÃ???Ã??Ã?Â¸rt den tyske keiseren, og som nÃ???Ã??Ã?Â¥ skal stilles ut i Oslo./description
# 2334117 type=video name=OlsenBanden i Jylland thumb=http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5YEzMHoEqfxXuXh56zgdXOe93fE.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/A51DE1AA3045D503 player=default rating=-1.00 description=The Olsen gang in Jutland. Ones again Egon Olsen has a plan when he gets out of Vridslose State Prison. He has found out that the Germans left a large sum of money (in American dollars and gold bars) in one of their commando bunkers, when they were defeated in 1945; the only problem it's in Jutland. Egon, Benny and Kjeld "appropriate" a car and drives to Jutland along with Kjelds wife and child Yvonne and Borge. They look forward to fooling the the people in Jutland, but of course, things don't go quite as planed. It ends with Benny, Kjeld, Borge and Yvonne sitting in the train back to Copenhagen, were they are overtaken by Egon in his car on the road next to the track. This is the last time the Olsen gang goes to Jutland./description
# 2334118 type=video name=OlsenBanden's Store kup thumb=http://www.scope.dk/images/film/004129/00001092_olsenbandens-store-kup_ukendt_360.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/CFFD1A9B505CE226 player=default rating=-1.00 description=After his usual stay behind bars, Egon has another cunning plan involving millions. They rob over 4 million from a money transport. The gang keeps a low profile and hide the money. But it's stolen by "Kongen" and "KnÃ¦gten", who immediately start living it up - in the penthouse suite at the Sheraton. The suitcase with the money changes hands several times, before Kongen's daughter takes of with all the money./description
# 2334121 type=video name=OlsenBanden gaa amok thumb=http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/s6VVFUPPMMJiVxHQOtEZrEJwoon.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/963A30D8FD41F54C player=default rating=-1.00 description=When Egon Olsen gets out of Vridlose State Prision once again, his friends Benny and Kjeld do not want to know about his new ingenious plan: they are actually WORKING in a shop! Thus, he has to think of something else to get his hands on the money of some international gangster./description
# 2334125 type=video name=Olsen Banden sidste bedrifter thumb=http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7BJhTo2BTBAb2hE1ajJRZ4Jc65v.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/952A0718800E136A player=default rating=-1.00 description=The Olsen Gang has finally made it. They are in Mallorca, having fulfilled their dream. Almost, that is. They don't have any money, so Egon has to open a safe at a restaurant to get some. As usual, however, Egon ends up in prision. When they return to Denmark, he has a new plan./description
# 2334132 type=video name=OlsenBanden paa sporet thumb=http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/d2ClkGpJRAisbKn75TxcDeMwHNu.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/B1F9BEA7E62995BD player=default rating=-1.00 description=Egon and his two cronies managed to sneak a fortune with them to Spain. Here they live a life in a whirl of pleasures, but they are not truly happy. While Egon always has the money chained to him, BÃ?Â¸ffen still manages to steal them. Egon ends up in jail once again, and when he comes out, he has a brilliant plan./description
# 2334153 type=video name=Olsenbanden ser roed thumb=http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4jMzFcHV7ecBP3jd9osUZU0UPzQ.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/E6F35D6922BE7D8A player=default rating=-1.00 description=Egon and the gang are hired to stage a robbery of an antique Chinese vase for an economically challenged baron. Naturally they fooled, which infuriates Egon. The gang tries to get back at the baron by switching the vase with a cheap Hong Kong copy. One attempt is made during the barons hunting party, where Egon ends up being bricked up in the catacombs. In another attempt, the gang has to coordinate breaking through several walls at The Royal Theater in Copenhagen with the "ElverhÃ¸j" overture./description
# 2334176 type=video name=OlsenBanden deruda thumb=http://www.scope.dk/images/film/005394/00006109_olsenbanden-deruda_plakat-dk_360.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/AAD721599579F037 player=default rating=-1.00 description=Egon is starting to be a little forgetful; he forgot the zone number, so he fails to open the strongbox. When he gets out of Vridslose State Prison, Kjeld and Benny have become associates of Yvonne's cousin Georg from America. He is not just some old-fashioned strongbox thief that can't remember like Egon, but a young hip IT criminal, that thinks that everyone else is inferior. However, Egon doesn't take lightly to the Georg's patronizing so he sabotages Georg's computer and ruins his cup. This time Egon's ambitions reaches a new high, when he and his gang break in to the World Bank, and they get away with it. Of course, thanks to Yvonne, they aren't rich very long./description
# 2334189 type=video name=OlsenBanden gaar i krig thumb=http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gQQim9Ak3rT4Ltsi1aolZjclHgG.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/F44CE8B4671295F2 player=default rating=-1.00 description=Some criminal EU ministers plan to turn Denmark into a gigantic fair ground and holiday paradise. Egon gets his hand at some important documents which could both make him rich and take care of Denmark's future./description
# 2334208 type=video name=OlsenBanden overgiver sig aldrig thumb=http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/h7MX4EPrFNeOvlhD4zWAktKb4b3.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/0FD413253CAEB940 player=default rating=-1.00 description=Egon plans to exploit knowledge gained during his latest term of incarceration. By stealing the unmanipulated financial records of DanInvest he obtains the majority of the stocks in the department store Magasin du Nord, just in time for their closing sale. The attempt to get the red suitcase that will save the day they rob the main vault at the EEC headquarters in Brussels and end up hijacking a tank./description
# 2334237 type=video name=OlsenBanden flugten over plankevaeket thumb=http://content.gucca.dk/film_covers/120/olsen_bandens_flugt_over.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/3FCF9A0D509312C9 player=default rating=-1.00 description=Criminal genius Egon Olsen presents his accomplices Benny and Keld with yet another infallible plan that can only end badly. The booty is a red suitcase containing values â??â??worth five million. The sinister mastermind Bang-Johansen carries the suitcase. The Olsen Gang follows him to Paris, where they put their cunning and carefully organized plan into motion./description
# 2334349 type=video name=OlsenBanden over alle bjerge thumb=http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uUBfpFpqf6OzrGsaXq5xLmgKBSh.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/FD133D6076293BD7 player=default rating=-1.00 description=Criminal genius Egon Olsen presents his accomplices Benny and Keld with yet another infallible plan that can only end badly. The booty is a red suitcase containing values â??â??worth five million. The sinister mastermind Bang-Johansen carries the suitcase. The Olsen Gang follows him to Paris, where they put their cunning and carefully organized plan into motion./description
# 2334361 type=video name=OlsenBanden sidste stik thumb=http://www.scope.dk/images/film/000130/00006114_olsenbandens-sidste-stik_plakat-dk_360.jpg date=2014-08-27 URL=http://www.sockshare.com/file/1C4F11B3AB45FB77 player=default rating=-1.00
